meanings.def: an object such as a silver cup that is given as a prize for winning a competition
examples: The club haven't won a major trophy for the past three seasons.
He picked up a trophy for best news editor.
Portugal will be defending the trophy they won last year.
The team paraded their League Championship trophy.

meanings.def: used in the names of some competitions and races in which a trophy is given to the winner
an object that you keep to show that you were successful in something, especially hunting or war
an impressive or beautiful thing or person that you have in order to make other people admire you
examples: We don't need a trophy building for our business.
These people are interested in opera as a trophy event.
